Play at the beginning of any other player's turn, before he takes any actions. That player loses one action for the turn (so, unless he plays a card of his own, he gets only one action).
Play this card immediately after the dice are rolled on any attempt (by any player) to destroy, control, neutralize. That roll is immediately changed, retroactively, to a 2.

Secrets Man Was Not Meant to Know
Play this card when any other special card is played, for ANY purpose. That card is immediately neutralized; it has no effect. Both cards are discarded.
Play this card at any time to give all of your Straight groups extra income equal to their normal income. Or play this card at any time to add 10 to defend any Straight group against attack.
Play this card at any time to add 10 to any attack against a Violent group.
Play this card at any time to add 10MB to the treasury of any Fanatic group.

Play this card during an attack. Except for the Illuminati themselves, no group may use its transferable power during this attack; any non-Illuminati uses of transferable power already announced do not count. Players who want to add more money to the attack, or use cards, may do so.
Play this card at any time to give all of your Peaceful groups extra income equal to twice their normal income. Or play this card at any time to add 10 to defend any Peaceful group against attack.
Play this card during your turn to allow you one extra action on that turn. Remember, no individual group except the UFOs may act more than once during one turn.
Play this card at any time to add 10MB to the treasury of any Straight group.
Play this card at any time to either count the money on any group card or examine all of one player's special cards.
Play this card at the beginning of any other player's turn. The player loses his turn completely.
Play this card after privilege has been invoked. The privilege is totally abolished. That attack cannot be made privileged.
Play this card at any time to give all of your Violent groups extra income equal to their nroaml income. Or play this card at any time to add 10 to defend any Violent group against attack.
You may interfere with one privileged attack. No other players may interfere.
Play this card at any time to add 10MB to the treasury of any Weird group.
Play this card at any time to give all your Liberal groups extra income equal to their normal income. Or play this card at any time to add 10 to defend any Liberal group against attack.
Play this card at any time that is NOT your turn. Each of your groups collects income. Exceptions: the Post Office does not pay, and the IRS does not tax.
Play this card at any time that you acquire or move a group. You may place the group on a side of another card where there is no arrow. If the puppet group is moved again, the
arrow on the master is lost.
Play this card at any time to give all of your Fanatic groups extra income equal to their normal income. Or play this card at any time to add 10 to defend any Fanatic group against attack.
Play this card at any time to give all of your Weird groups extra income equal to 2x their normal income. Or play this card at any time to add 10 to defend any Weird group against attack.
+10 to any attempt to control an Artifact owned by a rival. Or play at any time except during an attack to take control of an uncontrolled Artifact.
Play this card at any time to add 10MB to the treasury of any Communist group.
Play this card at any time to add 10 to any attack against a Criminal group.

Play this card on your turn. Pick any one Illuminati card which is not currently in play, and substitute it for your current Illuminati. You are now the new Illuminati for all purposes. This counts as an action, and may be used to end the game.
Play this card at any time to add 10MB to the treasury of any Violent group.
Play this card at any time to add 10MB to the treasury of any Peaceful group.
Play this card during any attack to add 10 to the Power or Resistance of either the attacker or the defender.
Play this card at any time to add 10 to any Straight group.
Play this card at any time to add 10 to any attack against a Government group.

Play this card when you have aided an attack, before the dice are rolled, to get back all the money you contributed to the attack. When you plan to use this card, make sure other players can verify how much money you contributed, to avoid arguments.
Play this card at any time to add 10 to any attack against a Peaceful group.
Play this card at any time except during an attack to put any one uncontrolled group in the discard pile. It does not count as destroyed.
Play at any time to move any Artifact to the uncontrolled area. It an attack was in progress, that Artifact has no effect.
Play this card at any time to add 10 to defend any attack on a Weird group.
Play this card at any time to add 10 to any attack against a Fanatic group.
Play this card at any time to give all of your Criminal groups extra income equal to their normal income. Or play this card at any time to add 10 to defend any Criminal group against attack.
Play this card at any time to add 10MB to the treasury of any Government group.
Play at any time to destroy any Artifact; place it in the discard pile. If an attack was in progress, that Artifact has no effect.

Play this card at the beginning of your turn. You get no income (the Post Office must still pay), but you get TWO extra actions on this turn. Remember, no individual group except the UFOs may act more than once during a turn.
Play this card at any time to revive a group from the
pile. It becomes uncontrolled. (If the Servants of Cthulhu destroyed the group, it still counts as a destroyed group as part of their secret goal. If they destroy it again, it counts again!)
Play this card at any time to add 10MB to the treasury of any Conservative group.
Play this card at any time to give all your Communist groups extra income equal to 2x their normal income. Or play this card at any time to add 10 to defend any Communist group against attack.
Play this card at any time to add 10MB to the treasury of any Liberal group.
Play this card during your income phase to double all your groups' incomes, for that turn only. This card does not allow the I.R.S. to collect twice, or require the Post Office to pay twice.
Play this card at any time to add 10MB to the treasury of any Criminal group.

You may attempt to destroy a single group with a power of 0. Roll attacking power vs. resistance, but a successful attack destroys the target. Playing this card is not an action, but the attack itself is an action.
Play this card at any time to add 10 to any attack against a Liberal group.
Play this card during your turn to automatically take control of any one uncontrolled group. Playing this card counts as an action.
Play this card at any time to add 10 to any attack against a Conservative group.
Exchange this card, at any time, for 25MB to be paces in your Illuminati treasury.
Play this card at any time except during an attack. You may reorganize your groups freely.
Play this card at any time to reorganize all your money freely-- that is, any amount(s) may be moved between any groups. You also get an extra 5MB which may be placed anywhere.
Play this card at any time to add 10 to any attack against a Communist group.
Exchange this card, at any time, for 15MB to be placed in your Illuminati treasury.
On your turn, you may discard any card (group or special) and get an extra action. Discarded groups, and any groups they controlled, go to the uncontrolled area.

All Fanatic groups are treated as the same alignment for the purpose of any attack you make. Fanatic gets +4 to control or neutralize Fanatic but -4 to destroy it.

Once per turn, you may spend your Illuminati action to discard all unconrolled groups and draw an equal number of cards. Any Special cards you draw become yours. The groups that you draw become the new uncontrolled area.
